name: photrix
description: A modern way to enjoy your photos. Think the functionality of LightRoom, the reliability of your local storage, the ease of use of your phone gallery, and the AI of Google.

scripts.build: npm run client:build && npm run server:build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.lint: npm run client:lint && npm run server:lint
scripts.test: npm run client:test && npm run server:test

author: Photrix Team
